text: George Watson was an Irish Lawn bowls international who competed in the 1934 British Empire Games. ==Bowls career== At the 1934 British Empire Games he won the silver medal in the rinks (fours) event with Cecil Curran, Charlie Clawson and Percy Watson. ==References== Category:Male lawn bowls players from Northern Ireland Category:Bowls players at the 1934 British Empire Games Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for Northern Ireland Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
title: George Watson (bowls)
